content.detailedDescription: I was coming from my office with a co-worker where we saw and orange light with a trail of smoke that seemed to be coming down slowly towards the mountain. we thought that was a plane that was coming down on fire, but nothing was reported on the local news
content.summary: Orange light

content.detailedDescription: I live in the northwest part of toronto on the 22nd floor of a condominum complex which is directly alongside a flightpath for inbound easterly aircraft.Our international airport is situated mere minutes from my home and often take note of various aircraft being somewhat of a aviation buff. it was getting late and after wacthing t.V. and last beer,my wife noticed a large aircraft approaching over the adjacent building (340 dixon rd.),we then went on to our balcony so i could guess the plane type.When the aircraft was directly in front of us,(roughly 1 mile away)we were in awe at the aircrafts size which i believe was the new airbus.I knew this because or the little fin on the wingtip.In a matter of seconds,we saw an intense white light under what appeared to be the fuselage,seemingly detach itself from the underside,pause briefly then zip ahead of the aircraft at a high rate of speed.My wife and i have discussed this all weekend and decided to post this in hopes others may have seen this as well or that someone can verify from other sources this sighting.I have denounced other possibilities for this such as a light falling from the aircraft,but if so it would have decended and trailed behind if that were the case.I���m a believer and we have both witnessed some strange phenomenon over the years but this sighting seals the deal! please! if anyone from the greater toronto area seen what we seen or if someone could shed some light on this with a scientific expanantion,it would give us peace of mind!Needsless to say,i find myself now every night before bed staring at the heavens in hopes of maybe recording this on video or get a couple of pictures if ever whatever it was appears again.
content.summary: Bright light under jet aircraft

content.detailedDescription: At around 4:58pm on sunday, november 1st i was outside taking pictures of the natural landscape as i am prone to do when i spotted a white round object moving in the sky at about 88 degrees from the horizon ( north ). the object remained moving south very slow in the sky and i quickly started taking pictures of it. i was able to take 6 pictures in raw (cr2)and 6 in jpeg before the objet desapear. strangely enough the object was very similar in appearance to the previous object that i captured on october 11th and october 24 of this year (as reported to the ufo center previously) except that this time it was moving south.
content.summary: Again same white spherical object moving very slow south.

content.detailedDescription: Was looking into the sky while driving on hwy 34 from agency to ottumwa. noticied the bright object in the sky. it then proceeded to hide behind a cloud. when coming off the hwy on exit 191 the object reappeared then just hung there and vanished.
content.summary: Refracting round object

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on the 526 from mt. pleasant where i work to north charleston where i live.  it was a bit before sunset and i noticed this black rectangular object high in the sky against some clouds.  well i slowed a bit but had to keep driving since is unsafe to stop on the 526.  i kept watching and watching and it didn't seem to be moving or moving very far, very fast at all.  i then noticed another object, higher still and off to the right of it somewhat.  very small and i do wear glasses but it might have been plane shaped.  at that time i wondered if it could be a helicopter or plane of some sort with something in tow.  i thought maybe it was a plane pulling behind one of those signs like i see off the coast of daytona sometimes.  but way too high for that and i sure couldn't read any message if that were an advertisement plane.  now i saw no rope or tow chain either, just the two objects.  i watched until i passed "north rhett" exit ramp i believe it was, and watched until i passed the rivers avenue exit ramps.  they began to move and i kept watching as i was driving, though trying to drive carefully.  i let my immagination go a little and i say it looked like a borg cube caught in enterprises tractor beam.  but seriously, this was very different.  i think it was flatter at one angle and wider at some other angle.  i thought, "what is that, is it a parachute of some kind being dangled down from some plane?"  i just don't have a clue.  
     well what made me notice it, i always watch the sky and hope to see a ufo.  when i first noticed it i swear i thought it was a ufo.  i like to consider the reasonable and think it was a helicopter towing something.  i guess that is possible but highly unlikely and uncommon for around here.  i mean for a plane or a helicopter to be towing something around here would seem dangerous to me.  i thought could it be a plane involved in some scientific experiment of some sort?  maybe an airforce helicopter dangling something down for some experiment.  but maybe these two objects weren't physically connected and just were somehow in formation with eachother.  the rectangular black object was definately not a plane or a helicopter, what it actually was, i have no clue.  
     i lost sight of the object because the trees are dense going towards the exit that i take to get home.  i couldn't see anymore due to the area i entered into.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw square to rectangular black dot against clouds high in sky.  that seemed not to be moving then some other vehiccle higher than that appearin smaller.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down 280 going north with my girlfriend and i looked up and pointed out this grouping of strange objects going east to west over the highway. at first i thought they were planes until i put on my sunglasses and noticed they did not have any wings and the sun reflected off of the shell. my girlfriend was like wow those are ufos, they cannot be planes. this grouping was in perfect formation and all were skipping while flying. almost like a rock skipping across water. they flew up and down while moving forward while still in formation. they were also flying really low about 40 feet above the tree line. i was about .25 mile away from the formation so i got a really good visual of what it was, or what it looked like. 
i drove about 2 miles down the road where the birmingham international airport is to the right of me which would be east. and wouldn't you know a f-16 flys out going to the west really fast. i guess after what i saw.

what we saw was not from here.
content.summary: Group of 4 ufos

content.detailedDescription: I was 7 years old when i witnessed what i can only describe as a transparent disc shaped object. it was late summer 1976.I can't recall the exact date. what i do recall clearly is this object traveling from the north and passing nearly over my head toward the south,slightly west of me. it was transparent in that what i saw was an outline of this disc and the cloud cover behind it as it moved. it was overcast and the sun was setting casting an orange glow on the western edges of the clouds. this object as it passed blended itself into the cloud cover only revealing the outline to me. mid way through the sighting i attempted to get the attention of my friend at the bottom of the hill i was standing on. i yelled his name at least 3x before i ran down to the bottom of the hill to find him w/his grandmother. they seemed to be catatonic. unresponsive. i ran back to the top of the hill to watch this object travel over the top of the tree line and out of sight. i ran back down the hill to find my friend now responding to what i was saying. i ran east pleading with my friend to follow me,thinking if i get to the rail road tracks that ran north to south i could catch one more glimpse of this object and so could my friend,but i didn't see it again.                          to describe my feelings during this i would have to say,i ran a full gambit of emotions. from excitement to disappointment,frustration to dismay and fear. during the first moments i felt extremely curious as to what i was seeing. when i realized i was alone to deal with what i was seeing,i felt,well,alone. i have since had two other sightings of varying objects. luckily i did have a responsive friend during one of these sightings to confirm that what i was seeing was really there. unfortunately he has lost his grip on reality in these recent years so his credibility is less than one would hope to have for a witness.                                     i'm unsure if i should continue and describe the other sightings here or submit another separate sighting report. (1981 witnessed bent cigar) (1986 witnessed metallic sphere 20" off the ground with friend.)
content.summary: Observed a transparent disc shaped object moving silently from north to south.

content.detailedDescription: I had just moved back to fl from pa 5 days earlier i was staying with a friend in port saint lucie for the night i walked outside because my wife and i were having a phone argument and as i looked up to observe the stars the sky was dimly lit from the city lights when suddenly about 80 feet off the ground traveling about 100-150 miles an hour from northwest to southeast a solid black disc had flown over head silent but you could hear the air moving around its surface then as it started to disapear in the distance it made a sharp turn straight up and disapeared at about 800 miles an hour it was quick but not fast enough to break the sound barrier this is one of many brief encounters ive had and once i saw your special on discovery channel ive felt compelled to tell my stories
content.summary: Ufo fly by

content.detailedDescription:
I was stationed aboard the  ranger for qual cruse with vf 121
i was assigned to the ready room watch one night and being
alone and board i found a book marked classafied.
and going throuh it i found one page that showed a cigar craft
about 100 feet in the  air between two navy vessels
they listed the captians and crew all over the photo was stamped 
offical navy photo i dont know why it was there except
in case a piolt saw somthing like it.
if i seen this there had to be many piolets that did also
the craft had no visable windows it looked almost like
rock incrusted had one crude antenna prouding from the bottom.
and no visable power. no one believes me but this must be able to
veryfiy.   thank you all the things you see on tv they want 
proof if this photo can be retrieved that should do it.
content.summary: Us navy photo

content.detailedDescription:
I was four years old. we lived outside lake carmel while my father attended ibm school. the house was directly across from a lake (my older sister knows how to get there, i don't remember).

i was awakened by lots of light "bouncing" around my room. when i looked out the window i saw a giant column of light going in/coming out of the water of the lake. there were "tinkerbell" lights dancing all around the area.

when i turned around there was a being (like the ones in cocoon) who communicated future things to me-i don't remember, or would understand, what i learned until my adulthood, and feel there is more locked inside.

i felt the most love coming from the being; and ever after when i saw reflected light (like sunlight off a cup of coffee)i would become really excited because "lighty" was coming (he never did); but that's what my parents teased me about as my "imaginary friend". 

i have felt the same energy once since in a group meditation and believe the being's name to be hilarion, though what i have read that was supposedly channeled by hilarion doesn't "feel" right.

i have always been different and have many other reasons why, but i believe what happened when i was four was very real.
content.summary: Only saw large golden column.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 630pm i went out side my job to smoke a ciggiret and talk to my co-workers that were out side. as i was smoking i decided to look upin the sky cause it was starting to get dark and we were talking about how the summer is over and how quick it went by. as we were talking i looked up and was looking south on union street when i seen something at first i didnt say anything to the guy i work with. i saw what looked like a bright orange light and i thought it was a shooting star cause the way it was falling, but then just stoped. as i was looking at it, it got brighter and brighter. it then moved east came down and moved west in a zigzag fashion. i taped one of the guys that was out side with me and we all looked up and were amazed we seen it move back up and it went stright back up and then came back down. when it came back down it stood ther in that one place for a few seconds and then moved to the east. then it started to dim. we found that weird that it moved and started to dim out but for a quick couple of seconds it had gotten brighter untill it dimed out completely. when i had first seen it i was kinda of excited thinking it was a shooting star never really seen one like that but when i seen it move i knew it wasnt one. ive seen an object like that befor at my mothers house 2 years back. i had told the guyhs at my job the day after i saw it at my mothers and the were make jokes on me for days. but when we all seen that we were all quiet we never seen this befor. we just want to know if any has seen something like that befor or we the olny ones.
content.summary: It was a small circle lookin thing that did not move like a plane.It moved from side to side and up and down

content.detailedDescription: I was staying up late on halloween, sitting on my bed and on my computer. i was listening to music when i looked out my window and saw three flashing ovals with a red glow around them. i left my room after looking at the clock on my counter which read 3:26. i went outside and the lights were still there. occasionally they would flicker and the red glow would seem to get brighter or dimmer. at first, i thought i was some kids with flashlights, because they seemed to be moving in circular patterns. i then saw them get smaller and ascend up until i could not see them anymore. i felt kind of scared at the sight of what i saw. when i woke up from sleeping that day, i just wanted to convince myself that i dreamt it, but i can't deny what i saw. i haven't told anyone besides my friend. i explained it to him over an online chat today. i'm afraid my parents won't understand.
content.summary: I saw three flashing white lights with a red glow moving in circular patterns above my neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: Not sure of the exact date or year. was sometime between 1996 and 1998. i was in my car with my mother. we had just left home to grab a bite to eat at the local pizza hut. driving up the hill on the main road we saw a black object above the car. my mother remembers the shape of it differently than i do ever since the night we first saw it. she saw it as a triangle and i saw it as a round object with one red light on one side and another red light on the other. the lights were shaped like rectangles. the sun was still out and bright but all i saw from the rest of the shape was black and featureless. id say it was about 5 feet across. i did have a much better view because i was in the passanger seat. i moved up and was looking out the front windsheild because it was right above our car. we slowed down and was probably going about 5mph and it stayed right above the car. a car was coming up behind us so we started moving again cause we were right in the middle of the main road. i am not sure why we didnt just stop the car and get out. as we drove away it started slowly going off into the distance and we lost sight of it as we went around the turn. it was not scary at all. it just seemed exciting. when we got home from eating it was already dark. we looked in the sky and there were at least about a dozen airplanes flying around the area. flying every way you could think of. crossing paths and everything. we figured someone must have reported something. i've still never seen that many planes flying around at one time.
content.summary: Saw black w/ one red and one green light ufo above car

content.detailedDescription:
Same as above

i awoke to the feeling i was visited. jumped up to look out the window to se a glimpse of the craft moving away down the street.
my son had also been coming to the side of my bed bedause of the "imgonnagitcha" which i would say to him at play. however, now i see a possible pattern of him being scared and my losing time.
content.summary: Like the one in close encounters

content.detailedDescription:
After a stormy rainy night i awakened to make a trip to the bathroom.
since there is no illuminated clock in the bedroom i checked the time in an adjacient room after changing clocks due to daylight savings time.
when returning to bed i looked out the window facing directly west and saw a very large bright half oval object of yellowish color with an orange tint which was completely stationary. 
there was a half bubble type light at the top right of the dome which was emitting extremely bright white strobe type beams of light going at a 45 degree angle going up toward the sky then down to the ground. 
there was no sound of any kind. the object looked flat on the bottom. but this could be a misconception since this ground is flat potato field and slopes down in back for some distance. bearing this in mind the object certainly could have been a different shape on the bottom that was not visable.
the moon was not out and the object was in front of the tree line. from my perspective the object appeared to be about 60 feet long and 500 feet from the house. i watched this object for about 10 min. trying to make something rational out of it and then it vanished like someone had shut off a light bulb. i have included a sketch for your observation. this has been a bit un nerving.
have not walked down to where the object was since we would be up to our knees in mud right now.
answers please......
content.summary: Large bright half oval object of yellowish orange color with bright half bubble type light to top right of dome sending out strobe like beams.

content.detailedDescription: I was the right side back seat passenger,the boy i was dating was behind the driver and the driver was my friends boyfriend at the time and she was the front seat passenger.It was about 9:00 pm.We were driving to her aunts house to drink alcohol because we were all under age and we were teens,the only one who was not going to drink was the guy i was seeing.We were driving with the windows down and the radio at the time was playing led zepplin.I remember freezing in the back seat of the 2 door car and it was pretty windy out.We saw this huge object really close to the road on the opposite side of the road,maybe about 20-30 yards away. we had no idea what the thing was so the driver pulled over on that side so we were facing the traffic on the opposite side of the road,but there were no other cars.The lights were so bright,i have never encountered since a light that was so pure.We were like what the f is that.All of a sudden it started to rise, straight up with no sound of an engine or swirling blades of a helicopter,just nothing,no movement under the thing and there were tons of fallen leaves that should have blown around but didn't, there was no more wind and the sound felt like it was being sucked out of the car.We watched it and i was trying to yell to the driver that this was scary and he needed to get the f outta there,but i couldn't even hear my own voice.It just kept rising and i saw my friend hitting her boyfriend but could't hear what she was saying.All of the sudden we started moving ,the driver was pulling away and like a huge rush of all sound came whooshing back into the car and i heard my friend yell get the f outta here now!I was trying to shove his seat also to get his attention.We were all freaked out and realized that we thought we were only there for a couple of minutes and it was now 15 minutes later than when we pulled up.We were late getting to her aunts house but we should have been on time even pulling over for the couple of minutes we thought we had.I didn't even pay any attention to the guy i was with til after and he was real scared too.He said he was yelling too but we all could not hear each other.
content.summary: About 60-70 ft long with white lights the whole length.

content.detailedDescription: we have witnessed a similar object over the last month and have video that was fuzzy, we have been watching the skies, around 5pm my girlfriend was outside setting up for halloween when she ran inside and said i think its back! we both grabbed cameras i took approx 50 photos, the object would be a bright glow over the mountain would fade out and reappear seemed to move unlike a normal aircraft. this is the fourth time we have witnessed this object, i have a good night photo and several shots from yesterday as well as a video of this object flying silently over our home. we are both professionals with pilot training and stand to loose our credibility, would like for someone to analyze our pictures and video to explain this object if possible!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Flash
content.summary: Bright glowing object.

content.detailedDescription: See for your self the pic was taken in the 1960's, over a local lake. we have had an increase in the last year of other sighting and i did some reseach and found that the area i live in has a history of ufo sightings. the triangle shaped ufo for instance that you have on your main page was spoted this summer by a group of 10 or more witnesses. it was only a hundred or so feet off the ground and made no sound as it few over the groups heads. the pic i am sending is intresting because it was taken before home computers and would have been hard to fake
content.summary: Have pic.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching my dogs in the yard behind tinted sliding doors.When i observed a round black ufo hovering above the street light on the next block over from me.I was really startled when two puffs of white smoke like substance emitted from the side or back i couldnt tell.It was one puff then a small ufo emerged from the smoke. then a seconf one emerged from the smoke.I was stunned.I couldnt see what happened to the small ufos,they dropped off behind some trees. then the lsrge ufo moved about five miles an hour over my home,no noise not a whisper.It remained the same height as the street light pole,not going up or down.The material looked very matte and finely lined in a circular pattern. it was  beautiful very velvety looking black.It was very low over the building i was in. also is their someone i can contack about a small appx four foot alien standing in my bedroom.I sat up looked and it just disappeared.Im not crazy i just cant tell anyone they would not believe me. thanks for listening janet whelpley
content.summary: Round black  no noise hovering over street light. about 8 p.M. cloudy and dull outside

content.detailedDescription: I was at work taking a moment to look at the stars (since this was the first clear night we have had in 2 weeks) when i saw an object pass. the object had no discernable shape, there were two dim lights on the object and that���s the only visible part of it. the reason i believe this was one object and not two was due to the way in which it moved. the best way i can describe it would be to imagine a pen with a light on each end, and as the object moved though the sky it wobbled from side to side. the object moved at a relatively fast pace to the south until i lost site of it. now i consider myself a relatively level headed person, i know this wasn���t a satellite, airplane, shooting star or a fireball. i spend a lot of time looking at the stars, and this was something i can say i have never seen before.
content.summary: Unknown object flying over peoria il

content.detailedDescription:
While working in the yard of a residence in lemoore, ca, at approximately 3:28 pm, i noticed a round, orange colored stationary object in the sky slightly to the north of my vantage point.  presuming it to be either a mylar balloon or other such object, i at first gave little thought as to the nature of the object.  after looking away and then back at the object, i noticed that it appeared to be stationary in position, not drifting as a wayward balloon or other such object would act.

at this point i was intrigued and started to observe the object intently, wondering as to just what it could be to hold a stationary position, yet be so clearly visible in the sky.  my initial conclusion ��� after discounting the possibility that it was a commercial airliner operated by southwest airlines (who���s planes are painted orange and are clearly visible as such) was that it could possibly be a weather sonde balloon or a commercial dirigible, such as an airship of the goodyear fleet.

this possibility did not, however, explain the stationary aspect of the object, and quite intrigued,  i retrieved a pair of 10 x 50 mm binoculars from within the home that i was working at and returned to the yard where i was able to relocate the object.  using the binoculars i was unable to determine the size/shape/distance of the object, due to handshake and my inability to determine the focal distance to the object.

lying on my back and propping up the binoculars with my arm resting on the ground, i attempted to focus on the still stationary object.  through the perspective gained through the binoculars, it appeared as if the object was round in shape and possibly convex on the portion visible from my perspective.  it is also possible that the object was segmented (as if to observe an orange from a polar view, bereft of its peel.)

as i starred at the object, grasping for a logical explanation of just what it could be, the object ��� within a few seconds ��� became silver in color, and began to travel towards the west.  at this time the object began to accelerate at what seemed to be an ever increasing rate.  i tracked the object towards the west for about 35 degrees of arc when the object abruptly changed direction towards the northwest for a fraction of a second and then immediately jogged back upon its path and headed southwest, making what appeared to be a zee pattern.  i then lost visual track of the object as it traveled out of my vantage that was precluded by the trees on the western edge of the property.

i would estimate the total duration of this sighting to be approximately two minutes and am unable to fashion a logical explanation for the size/shape/movements of the object based on my own knowledge of the currently in-service airships of the world governments.  i speculated that this could have been a capsule-type re-entry vehicle, however the rapid acceleration and changes of direction does not support this conclusion.  the possibility that the object was some kind of balloon is also highly unlikely due to the fact that this type of airship does not accelerate or change direction as this object did.

my personal speculation on the matter ��� based on my observations ��� is that the object was at least at large as the international space station and when first observed was at a lower altitude and thus was illuminated by the sun while located at the very fringes of the atmosphere (hence the orange color.)  the object then descended vertically into the atmosphere (turning silver in appearance) and proceeded westward towards the location of naval air station lemoore before twice changing direction (first north then south) and traveling southwestward towards vandenberg air force base.

this object made no detectable noise and left no visible contrail so i must conclude that this object is a yet secret aircraft operated by the u.S. military that is capable of outer-atmospheric altitudes and super-sonic speeds or was of extra-terrestrial origin and exceeds all capabilities of currently existing aircraft.
content.summary: Circular/round -- possibly convex on visible portion of disk

content.detailedDescription: Several of us were sitting around a fire pit giving out candy to the trick or treaters when this bright light was spotted in the sky.  we all began watching it and it was hovering in the same spot, then moved slightly to the right and stopped again.  we were discussing what it could possibly be because it wasn't a plane, it didn't look like a helicopter.  there was no sound from it. it was flashing like amber, white lights and was in our sight for a couple of minutes then just sort of dimmed its lights and when it did it was sort of red, then just faded out of our sight.  approximately 30 minutes later it appeared again, this time coming closer toward us rather rapidly,then just stopping abruptly in flight.  it hovered there for a minute or two, appearing to flash its lights again, yet it almost looked like it was on "fire" but it wasn't on fire.  it hovered there a minute or two then slowly the lights faded out again just as they had the first time. then about an hour later it appeared again, in approximately the same spot, it moved a little to the left, hovered again then faded out again for the third time. we called the local radio station but no one had called in about it.  i called mufon and left a message and then i called the police.  the police said no other reports had been made that they knew of but would keep an eye on the sky.
content.summary: Bright lights - amber flashing.  appeared 3 different times in a 2 hr period.  almost appeared to be as fire, but still had flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed blinking lites, first appeard to be stationary but is moving slowly. watched it through binos and could not see any details. it is in ne part of sky. still visible during posting. viewed from residence in oklahoma city
content.summary: bliking lites, red green white

content.detailedDescription: Trick or treating with my 8-year-old son and noticed an orange "orb" of light in the sky underneath the full moon.  it appeared to be moving from the south to the north in a straight line, east of where we were walking.  the light was constant.  no flashing strobe as you'd see on aircraft.  it was 4 times larger than any visible stars.  clear sky, no clouds, full moon, no wind.  my son also observed it.  it was moving at a rate about twice what we have observed aircraft in the area previously.  we watched the object for about 2 - 3 minutes and then it vanished.  i can't explain what it was.  there was no sound, no other aircraft i could see in the area.
content.summary: Moving orange light

content.detailedDescription: Object had bright misty flashing red lights, oval or round shape. descended downward at 180 degrees, no sound, then was gone. lasted 20 seconds at best.
content.summary: Oval with bright misty red lights consuming entire front of object.

content.detailedDescription: It (lights)shot up from the ground and was dancing around, was near the ho-chunk barrial grounds, has always felt there was something about that ground. heard a story of a crash of a ufo in the early 1900. object went up and down, side to side, would like an investigator to come out to the sight before the winter sets in in december. june the 28th took his camera out and saw military jets flying around the area. does not know of a military instation in the area, has video on tv.
content.summary: Dancing lights

content.detailedDescription:
we were driving back from an early morning missouri youth deer hunt to prepare for a football game. i looked at the clock and said, "you have time to nap it's 9:38 and your game isn't till noon." my son said to me dad there are two odd disks in the air. we were on hwy 5 just south of mm road heading north about 2 miles out of sunrise beach at the lake of the ozarks. i looked to "humor" the child and to my dismay i too saw two craft that appeared white. i then slowed to about 35 mph looked up at about 35 degrees above the horizon and estimated them at 50 or 60' silver disks just after they seemed to "hover" and we both were rather shocked. i continued on, they raised in altitude so that i couldn't see them and continue to drive, as there was no place to turn off to observe them, i told my son to keep an eye on them. he did and i peaked again and saw one flash away. i asked him where the other was and he said it "snapped away to the east" it was wierd. i've seen a ufo 2 other times in my life both times with witnesses. first in bristol tennesse in 1960 and in columbia mo in 1966. 
  do you have other reports? i never would have believed it "what my son said" unless i had seen it myself. they weren't planes, birds etc as we've pleanty of vultures and eagles around here as well as gulls and it wasn't conventional aircraft, it was truely amazing. i've 2 degrees and am a decorated usn vet that worked for the navsecgru so i am careful before i declare something spectacular. i think either the military up at the base some 60 miles away has some interesting items or we aren't alone it was that awsome. 
a concerned dad
content.summary: 2 ufo's both same shape silver, flying together 50-60 foot diameter 2 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of a flooded creek and did not notice object. when i got home to look at photo's i saw the object. i've taken lots of photo's of huge jetliners in the area before, but they always looked like little bleeps on the photo's. this thing was huge>
content.summary: Did not see it, just saw it when dowloaded photo to computer

content.detailedDescription: I live in brooklyn heights in tall building on xxth floor with a balcony. that day i smoked cigarettes on the balcony. the view i have is partial new jersey sky and partial brooklyn and far away queens sky. every day i see a lot of planes in the sky and i know how they're moving, how they look like. i notice this object immediately. why? because, when you step on my balcony you can't see much of people, traffic, so basically nothing is going on except what's on the sky. and this object looked like wasn't moving (read: moving too slow for a plane or and definitely didn't looked like a helicopter). that's why it has come to my attention. i didn't know what to think about it, because every day i see strange objects on the sky, but always i was looking for the explanation for it and most of the time it was something i know. usually plane, sometimes a bird, balloon. the object appeared from north making left turn into east part of the sky. the object looked like was hanging in the air , but it was moving very slow. all i was thinking was to take the best picture possible. my girlfriend couldn't see nothing. the object was really far away from my balcony. disappeared in the sky after few minutes. about 10-15 minutes later the same object appeared again , but this time it was much closer, moving about the same speed making the same left turn. basically the same event but much closer, and girlfriend was able to see it. the first and the second event was about the same period of time no longer than 5 minutes. first submitted picture (original) is darker than the time of the day at that time due dark lens i was using f/5.6 and maximum focal length 300mm with 3x teleplus pro 300 extender. picture is blurred, because i couldn't use auto focus only manual focus.
content.summary: The object looked like was hanging in the air , but it was moving very slow.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving down the entrance to a campground on clearwater lake about nine thirty pm when a glowing red sphere came out of the woods about 150 feet ahead of me and headed toward our car.  i was going about thirty mph and the object was coming toward me at about the same speed following a slightly wavy path. it came within a couple of feet of the hood of my car and then raised up a little and flew over the drivers side fender and right past my open window about thirty inches from my face. i could have reached out and touched it. it was about the size of a soccer ball and perfectly spherical and glowed red the color of the brake lights on a car.  i looked back after it passed and watched it follow a wavy path down the road behind me until it went around a curve and wasn't visible any more. we just stopped the car and sat there in awe of what we'd both seen.
content.summary: Close range encounter of glowing sphere
